oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter of Francis Bacon to William Cecil, Lord Burghley
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bacon, Francis
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Theater--England--London--History--16th century
Theater--England--London--History--16th century--London--1595
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Francis Bacon to William Cecil, Lord Burghley (1595-6) regarding the non-performance of a masque.
The letter appears in the printed Inns of Court collection, Vol. 1, p. 80, lines 126-7.
